acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These papers were deposited on 1987 Nov 2

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These items are advance or reading copies of novels submitted for her review; cover letters are present with each manuscript.

did.unittitle: Bopby Maxine Chernoff, w/cover letter from Jody Nolen, Coffee House Press 1986 March 11
The Rug Merchantby Philip Lopate, w/cover letter from Stacy Schiff, Viking/Penguin Inc. 1986 July 8
The Sportswriterby Richard Ford, w/cover letter from Gary Fisketjon, Random House ca. 1986
